were locked out of their account Added MAC addresses to DHCP servers white list before placing new PCs to the floor Used SSH to log into servers for evidence of configuration settings Ghost imaged operating systems and configured them for use Pulled and located cat5 cables and phone lines Education BBA in Project Management The University of Texas at San Antonio San Antonio TX September 2012
